text: Ned Dixon "Dickie" Hemric (August 29, 1933 - August 3, 2017) was an American collegiate and professional basketball player. He was born in Jonesville, North Carolina. He played for the Boston Celtics during his entire career from 1955 through 1957. Hemric died on August 3, 2017 at his home in Akron, Ohio at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Boston Celtics players Category:Sportspeople from North Carolina
title: Dickie Hemric
